casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christina Shea WALTERS 548A00-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2018 Shelagh R. Kenney, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Walters, Christina Shea. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. James E. Williams, Jr., Attorney at Law, Carrboro, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Becton, Charles, et al.. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Retired Members of NC Judiciary.

*667The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 1st of May 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 2nd day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
